tool_description: Checks current availability for healthcare providers within specified date ranges, considering existing appointments and schedule modifications.

provider_ids.description: List of provider IDs to check availability for

error_messages: Invalid date range: end_date must be after start_date
Date range too large: Maximum date range is 90 days
Provider not found: One or more provider IDs do not exist
Too many providers: Maximum 50 providers per query
Past date specified: Cannot check availability for past dates
usage: Provide one or more provider IDs and a date range. The tool returns available time slots for each provider during the specified period.

provider_availability.description: List of provider IDs and their availability status

available_slots.description: Array of available time slots in ISO format

total_slots.description: Total number of available appointment slots
